questions.prompt: You are approached by a frantic lead developer, foaming at the mouth they scream the project must be finished by tonight. How do you respond?
choices: Throw it into GPT and hope for best
Ask your coworkers to work on it with you.
Tell your boss to go to hell.

questions.prompt: You just finished writing a new feature for the company app. What is your next step?
choices: Contact the project manager, and wait for the code review
Write a comprehensive suit of unit tests
